 public void connect(BCKNeuron n,
                     double w,
                     int delay) throws Exception
connect to neuron n with weight w and delay 'delay'

Throws: Exception
thrown when 'n' does not exist, or delay <0
deltaWeight 
 public void deltaWeight(BCKNeuron pre,
                         int delay,
                         double dw) throws Exception
change the weight of the connection to neuron pre with delay d by dw

Throws: Exception
thrown when attempt made to change weight of non-existent connection.
deltaWeight 
 public void deltaWeight(int neuronid,
                         int delay,
                         double dw) throws Exception
change the weight of the connection to neuron with id 'neuronid' with delay d by dw

Throws: Exception
thrown when attempt made to change weight of non-existent connection.
